info.name: Testrun
info.description: API endpoints for the Testrun API

request.description: Obtain a list of applicable and available network adapters for use in testing
Get the current system configuration
Update the current system configuration
Start Testrun against a target device

response.name: Device Not Found (404)
Testrun Already in Progress (409)

request.description: Stop Testrun from running against a device
Get the current status of Testrun. Suggested that this is called every 5 seconds to capture most events

Cancelled (200)
Non-Compliant (200)
Compliant (200)

request.description: Stop the Testrun framework

request.description: Get the current Testrun version and check if a software update is available
